replies.msg:
前言

重覆嘅野唔會再講，網上大把KOL講嘅野岩又好錯又好，大部份都係irrefutable。既然我一而再，再而三重申過冇事唔好出街。

好多人都話叫班專家食屎，兩星期又兩星期，究竟幾時先有社區大爆發。係timeline黎講，專家當然會預料新年會多咗人與人之間嘅接觸。之但係隻病毒未黎到香港，點transmit？

情人節係一個關卡。尤其你見身邊班朋友當病毒係流料，仲可以繼續social life，我係你就同佢絕交，橫掂佢都唔會長命得去邊。所以接下來呢兩個星期仲緊要過新年。

正題

我三星期前已經講過

//咁incubate 緊嘅tourists 點篩走 ?//
https://lihkg.com/thread/1831396/page/1

結果真係有班incubate緊嘅病人黎左香港。
正如我所講，當你唔知個mechanism of transmission，政府唔肯封關，咁唯有自己封關（我指緊你度門）。Survival 話就可以用antiseptics 解決，咁incubation呢？加埋asymptomatic ，其實件事係大鑊度搶resources 亦都唔算係件過份嘅事。你話佢地over-react，不如我問返你中招個risk丫？

好多人將科學當成宗教咁崇拜。最後好多人都因為睇唔到而返返去status quo, i.e. 吃喝玩樂挽。
係啊，媾女好過癮啊，亦都係做生意好時候。但係咁嘅環境底下，仲出乜街？Nonetheless,聽日依然會有一大人出街過節。

然後回到去我１月５日講過嘅野
//… when shit gets serious, a mask is just a placebo…//

Final thoughts

Q1. 事後丸要點食?
A1. 自己搵醫生，藥房佬問。之前我見過香港有班students搞咗個page教人食藥，其中有提到plan B。但係如果你熟呢隻藥係乜野人食，根本冇人會係網上教。

Q2. 盲搶班友係咪戇鳩
A2. 我唔直接去答你，用例子答。早幾個星期公司大減價，好多廁紙賣得平過超級市場，所以老細同我見貨到果陣未上架就收定幾條係staffroom，收工先買。即係咁，你笑人戇鳩囤幾百條廁紙果陣，有冇諗過呢啲嘢今日唔用，聽日都會用？換言之有得stock就stock。公仔麵廁紙牙膏bilibala日用品買定囤係度，起碼真係大爆發果陣就唔駛特登用條命冒險去買。就算最後冇事，呢樣consumable 都會有用完嘅一日啦。

Q3. 罷工點睇？
A3. 算把啦，有幾多叫人罷工仲係香港返緊工？而返緊工又有幾多人會響應罷工？運動有冇Connect到香港人？有。不過同病毒對比，病毒connect到個spectrum仲廣過幾廿條人命換返黎嘅運動。

Q4. 點睇派口罩，同搶口罩。
A4. 上網抽口罩令我諗起用bot排隊抽iphone。有program嘅人自然有更多resources，而當你有更多resources 果陣你會consider the society as a whole or yourself alone? 呢幾日見到surgical mask都可以炒到幾百蚊一盒，好老實，touch wood講句，中招即刻幫襯呢班撚樣。
雖然話就對形象好，但係口罩就咪派啦。排隊黨係一個問題，派唔派到俾有需要出街嘅人又係一個問題，另外好唔明白一樣野，點解唔駛出街嘅人反而係priority？

最後嘅最後
1. 生活用品，食物，甚至水都儲定
2. 長期病患，而且受藥物控制嘅，就配定幾個月嘅藥先啦
Crestor/Lipitor/Twynsta/Norvasc/Xalatan/Xalacom/Humira/Spiriva/Imdur/Diabex/Insulins/Maxidex/Zoloft/Prozac/Cymbalta/Prednisone/Janumet/Coversyl/Nexium/OCPs/Glucagon/Keppra/Sigmacort/Advantan … etc
3. 急救用品都要買定架啦，去得藥房都係病人多。食唔到二手病毒，三手都一樣有佢個potential threat
Nitrolingual/Ventolin/Epipen/Claratyne/BandAids/Antiseptics …. Etc

而家我個人就係外國，你要我幫你買嘢係冇問題。之但係我要返工，有時間先寄到你想買嘅野。
咁啦，你有需要就俾條list我，我睇下砌唔砌到。價錢就跟返公司價，用埋staff discount又點話？不過，shipment 自費。

https://www.facebook.com/Nusinersen194326

樓主你好

想問吓如果睇以下圖
因為病毒🦠係有7個mutation
所以先有不同程度嘅感染力同致命率

抑或其實流通嘅病毒
甚至乎多於一類？
謝謝

replies.msg:
This is a picture of a phylogenetic tree. In a phylogenetic tree, related viruses are grouped together on branches. Influenza viruses whose HA genes’ share the same genetic changes and who also share a common ancestor (node) are grouped into specific “clades” and “sub clades.” These clades and sub-clades are alternatively sometimes called “groups” and “sub-groups.”

https://www.cdc.gov/flu/about/viruses/types.htm

唔同mutations 有唔同作用 e.g. hemagglutinin & neuraminidase

而用MERS黎做例子點解CoV咁把炮
...Evidence of MERS-CoV inducing type I IFN only weakly and late in infection (9–15) suggests that MERS-CoV has also evolved mechanisms to evade the host immune system. In fact, MERS-CoV M, ORF4a, ORF4b and ORF5 proteins are reported to be strong IFN antagonists [18]. Further studies, using the transient overexpression of MERS-CoV accessory protein ORF4a, ORF4b, and ORF5, show that the MERS-CoV accessory proteins inhibit both type I IFN induction [18,27,28] and NF-kappaB signaling pathways [28]. MERS-CoV ORF4a, a double-stranded RNA (dsRNA) binding protein [27], potentially acts as an antagonist of the antiviral activity of IFN via the inhibition of both the interferon production (IFN-β promoter activity, IRF-3/7 and NF-κB activation) and the ISRE promoter element signaling pathways [18]. MERS-CoV ORF4b, on the other hand, is an enzyme in the 2H-phosphoesterase (2H-PE) family with phosphodiesterase (PDE) activity. Even though MERS-CoV ORF4b is detected primarily in the nucleus of both infected and transfected cells [18,27,28], the expression levels of cytoplasmic MERS-CoV ORF4b are still sufficient to inhibit activation of RNase L, an interferon-induced potent antiviral activity [18,28]. MERS-CoV ORF4b is the first identified RNase L antagonist expressed by a human or bat coronavirus and provides a possible MERS-CoV mechanism for evasion of innate immunity by inhibiting the type I IFN and NF-kappaβ signaling pathways [16,28]. The MERS-CoV replicase proteins, including nsp1, nsp3 and nsp14, were also shown to interfere with the innate immune response signaling pathways through different mechanisms [21,29,30]. Evidently, MERS-CoV has developed various mechanisms to evade the host immune system....

PMC5850400

利申 冇讀過virology
